metadata.name: Candy Collective Pass #2
metadata.description: Add some colour & fun to your digital collection with Candy Collective NFTs - the must-have NFTs in the web 3.0 world. Each CC NFT is unique & one-of-a-kind. Holding a CC NFT not only adds a pop of colour to your portfolio, but also offers benefits like exclusive insights, early access to new drops, giveaways, exclusive events, merchandise and so much more. Join the most vibrant & exciting community on the Ethereum blockchain.
